name: Crash the Hell Demake
description:
General:

This game was created during the Lowrezjam 2021. It is a action-platformer with 8 bit graphics. 

Features:

- destroy the enemies with your sword

-  5 different enemy types

- 1 boss battle

- traps like spikes and brittle platforms

Controlls:

A - walk left

D - walk right

K - jump

SPACE - draw your sword
